position_desc.position_summary: Design, build, and implement Linux infrastructure solutions using Puppet, Python, Ansible, Shell, and VmWare.  Additionally provide general automation solutions.
results: Within 6 months, rolled out Puppet and Ansible for automated software deployment, system checks, and database backups
Reduced countless staff hours by developing Python tool to collect metadata and copyright details for 1000+ NIU-produced articles from Microsoft and SHERPA RoMEO REST APIs
Migrated 5 out-of-date systems to new versions on recent OS builds
Made automated CentOS 7 installs, non-root logins, and group-based security a standard
Provided pricing information for Google Cloud, Azure, and AWS hosting options.

position_desc.position_summary: Full-stack developer of custom-built infrastructure coordination tools.
results: In Splunk infrastructure migration, provided tooling that saved business partners 1000+ manual tasks for each deployment
Scripted Perl against F5 REST API to modify external data groups for layer 7 load balancing
Guided new area into self-service infrastructure model to save weeks of process and thousands of dollars when building new systems by using Puppet and in-house IaaS solution
Delivered data manipulation Perl scripting for MQ support, reducing delivery time of test queue builds from 5 days to 30 minutes

Created Perl Mojolicious web hook receiver and used Gitlab CI runner as proof of concept to automatically create development branches, test code, run Docker, update Gitlab issues, and open request for change tickets

position_desc.position_summary: Enabled and supported workstation tools and infrastructure for 1000+ developers.
results: Python scripting for reporting product usage saving time for management
Pioneered low-overhead software testing via local Docker containers instead of creating new or interfering with in-use virtual machines
Led support for an in-house developed distributed testing tool involving Java, IBM WebSphere, and IBM MQ
Increased developer velocity and reduced development service dependencies through support of Service Virtualization (SV) using IBM Rational Integration Tester (IBM RIT)
Took initiative to develop self-guided training with local workstation Tomcat JPetStore app, reducing costs for pricey vendor-provided training courses

position_desc.position_summary: Apache, Tomcat, JBoss, IBM IHS, and Puppet support on RHEL 6
results: Primary developer of common Puppet modules for Apache and Tomcat, including TLS and Kerberos enablement
Architect, developer, and maintainer of Puppet-controlled, shared Apache and Tomcat web farm, allowing stable and secure environment for various one-off applications
Handled off-hours implementations for infrastructure upgrades and patching
Capacity planning for IHS servers in J2EE environments
Wrote Splunk alerting based for allerting F5 attack signatures

position_desc.position_summary: Capacity planning, performance test consulting, performance test analysis for enterprise-level projects and software
results: Forecasted data center power and space utilization uncovering the need for more power
Created custom charting macros in MS Excel to quickly analyze performance test results
Volunteered Perl scripting to automatically gather agency backup modem serial numbers

headlines.headline: From Zero to Automated in Six Months
headlines.summary: Implemented faster OS rollouts, Ansible, and Puppet to infrastructure in my current role within 6 months

headlines.headline: Eleven Years Active
headlines.summary: All experience has been hands-on and technical.

headlines.headline: Hundreds of Nodes Impacted
headlines.summary: Working on an infrastructure larger than the Library of Congress, I have provided solutions both at mass and targetted across several programming languages and technologies.

headlines.headline: Language Agnostic; Automation Passionate
headlines.summary: I adapt to the language or technology to fit the need.  Although I "grew up" on Perl and Shell, I really enjoy working in Python.

person_summary: Automation-minded infrastructure analyst with 15 years of IT experience.  Hands-on involvement with a variety of open source and vendor-provided software. Solid technical troubleshooting, scripting, maintenance, and software delivery experience in a vast, diverse, geographically redundant, highly available infrastructures.
